original_text: The army leader chooses his best soldiers to go forward. They almost fall as they run! They hurry to the city wall and they prepare to attack.
korean_text: 그가 그의 존귀한 자들을 생각해 내니 그들이 엎드러질 듯이 달려서 급히 성에 이르러 막을 것을 준비하도다

sentences.original_text: The army leader chooses his best soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 군대 지도자는 그의 최고 용사들을 선택한다

sentences.original_text: They almost fall as they run
They hurry to the city wall
